Text:
Very nice, especially this version of "Sebastian", I've never heard before (even if Steve Harley's Original is the absolute benchmark). 
.
Marina and the Dimondes I'd released some years ago (and re-released some months ago) - she's a great performer and she sings in a song "a Polish girl in Amaerica!" Yes, the former east Republics have great potential being released if they get freedom. This would be my aim to say it to Putin.
